name: BROKEN WORLD (Fire_flintq8)
description: 1. There were a child who lives in a peace. surrounding by his lovely mom and dad. he was living in a happy calm home. One day, he was on the way to his room to have a sleep. Suddenly, he noticed that the mirror was broken. and the hallway started getting longer and longer. The sounds of the ghosts are getting louder and closer. At this point, he did not move or run. He just closed his eyes and started crying. A few moments later, he found out that the world is not the same anymore. He is in a dark, huge hole that isolated from the world. and the only thing he could hear is his mom's voice. he was in a broken another world. // EVERYTHING IS FROM SCRATCN EXPECT FOR SOUND TRACK// TEAM MEMBER HAMAD AL MEKAIMI (DESGINER) MOHAMMAD ALDREES (PROGRAMMER) AISHA ALDOSARI (GAME DEVELOPER)
